channel.title: HelP: Does anyone know how to make an NPC work correctly...?
channel.description: I know there used to be a TuT on this but it's long gone. By working correctly i mean: Movement, any interface if anyone knows how to do that. Thanks.

item.title: HelP: Does anyone know how to make an NPC work correctly...?

item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

doggiedoo86:

i made a tut want it? nvm

Your retarded. that is like 100% spam and if you weren’t going to tell me anyways why the hell would you brag about it, that just makes you a person without a life who gets their joy from showing off on the forums. [br][size=1]Posted on: September 01, 2007, 03:59:59 PM[/size][hr]I really still need help its been like 5 hours and nobody will help.
